English: lit. to breathe through the same nostril (idiom); fig. two people say exactly the same thing (usually derog.)

d.f: `比喻~`彼此~`互通~`聲息~，`採取~`相同~`的~`態度~、`主張~。
q: 《`醒世姻緣傳~．`第~`六~`回~》：「`那~`晁~`住~`媳婦~`就是~`合~`珍~`哥~`一個鼻孔出氣~，`也~`沒有~`這等~`心意~`相投~。」

English: lit. to breathe through the same nostril (idiom); fig. two people say exactly the same thing (usually derog.)
to sing from the same hymn sheet
